customer_reviews.author: Rebca10

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye to psoriasis elbows!
customer_reviews.text: Dry skin and psoriasis don't mix. Since I've been using this oil, my elbows no longer have the tell-tale white marks of psoriasis. This oil is light and absorbs easily into the skin (unlike coconut oil). The trick is to use about half a pump, spread it on both hands, and lightly brush your hands on your skin then after the excess is off your hands, go back and spread the oil to cover more skin; enough of the oil will be absorbed after 5-10 minutes and you won't need to be concerned with getting oil on anything you touch or wear. One to two pumps should be enough for your entire body so this bottle will last months.

Unfortunately I had to pour it into another, less-convenient bottle. Too bad :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Better than shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond oil. I’ve ordered it for years. I use it for shaving my legs. It keeps my razor sharp and my skin smooth. I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t cause any issues. For extra moisture I can use it as an after shower moisturizer. I’ve also used it in homemade sugar scrubs. It also lasts for a while too. I typically use 3 bottles a year.
customer_reviews.author: ReadySetGOrdon

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. It's very lightweight and doesn't feel greasy at all. Great for hair, nails, and skin. I use it as a carrier for tea tree oil. The pump makes it very easy to use, and for what it costs and how much you get, it will go a long way. I will definitely be purchasing Viva products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product! Moisturizes skin so well! Absorbs quickly and isn’t greasy feeling! Makes my skin so smooth and I have noticed a difference in how great my skin looks since using this. My daughter uses it and has sensitive skin and it doesn’t cause any issues! Can be used for a carrier oil also. We will definitely continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for massaging
customer_reviews.text: Soft smooth texture, didn't cause any skin bumps or reactions even 10-days afterwards. I couldn't detect any scent of any kind from the bottle, or my hands during application. Skin absorbed very well, didn't stain any clothing either.
customer_reviews.author: FunkyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil and every Viva Naturals product I have tried so far. This almond oil is great for moisturizing! Five females in this house, and we use it on hair, skin, or taking off makeup! There is no scent, the pump is nice to keep from making a mess, and a bottle lasts a couple of months with daily use. I have reordered several times!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing and Healing
customer_reviews.text: This oil made such a difference in my skin. I was having some issues with red patches on my hands and face. I was using coconut oil and it just wasn't helping. So, I read up on other oils. This is what I chose to try. I mixed it half and half with pure Aloe. I just love how it immediately began to soften and heal all my dryness and red, scaly patches. I can't believe it worked better than the prescription my Dr gave me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty lightweight oil. I use it in my hair after a shower, in a small amount to keep my hair healthy and from getting dry and frizzy. I don't use any other products. It has no scent, so I choose to add a little scent to it. In the winter when it's really cold and dry, I'll use this on my skin too as an extra layer of moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second buy. First of all, I liked the scent. It’s not strong but still there. The texture was thicker than I expected. (Maybe because I had been using light oil before this.) so the control of the amount was a little tricky. When it’s too small, it doesn’t spread all the way, when it’s a little much, the skin remains oily for a long time. In winter, I sometimes use it with lotion for this one everyday is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: BeholdtheSky

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this oil. I usually buy a different brand, but I bought this because of the pump. It makes it much easier to use and is a much smarter design than the traditional bottled oil I usually buy. The pump works great, the oil feels nice and works well for the things I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: kray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for my DIY home and beauty products. It is a great value for a great quantity. The bottle was actually a little bigger than I thought it would be. My favorite thing about this product is the fact that it even came with a pump top! So I can use that or just squeeze from the bottle. Overall, I'm completely satisfied and will continue to use this brand in my products!
customer_reviews.author: kara hargrave

customer_reviews.title: large bottle with pump!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large bottle, hand pump makes using and spreading on skin very very easy. Just the right texture and very soothing to my dry flaky skin. Overall very pleased. Just started using it so I haven't tested long-term effects but so far, my dry skin looks and feels smoother after a few days of consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: My go to mosturizer now.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time almond oil user. This is light, yet moiturizing. Does not stay greasy like coconut oil. I am loving this stuff. I am using it everywhere! Am trying to go all chemical free, and so far it has not been a huge sacrifice. It's actually disgusting how much crap that's inside every single lotio/product out there. This stuff is great and I will keep ordering it! My husband also uses it to massage me on my back and he doesn't think it's overly greasy either. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LWB

customer_reviews.title: Natural
customer_reviews.text: Viva Sweet Almond Oil is a great natural way to nourish your skin. It moisturized my skin and makes it feel soft and healthy. You can use it right out of the bottle for unscented or add an essential oil if you wish. It is also wonderful to use for a massage. It came in a large size bottle at a good price. I will reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, fragrance free oil. First of all the bottle is very large. It comes with a cap and a pump. I use it to massage into my cuticles which are very dry. I have noticed a difference after using it for a few days. It feels very nice on your skin and it doesn’t leave a sticky residue after it sets in.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMorales69

customer_reviews.title: Oil Used Primarily to Remove Make Up
customer_reviews.text: I use sweet almond oil to remove my makeup every single day while benefiting from the moisturizing aspect of the oil (that way I don't need to use more lotions). It never goes rancid as I keep it in my refrigerator except for the 1/2 cup or so I leave in a small mason jar in my bathroom. No weird odors, light and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brisa

And the smell it’s the same like the vegetable oil you would use for cooking. Literally felt a greasy smell on me after putting it on. And my skin was even more dried than before putting this. This product is rubbish and feel completely scammed. Don’t understand where so many good reviews come from.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: No smell. Not greasy. Works perfect. Since using this, I haven't had a need to use lotion at all throughout the day. I apply it after showering, and that's all you have to do. My skin feels better, hydrated and looks healthier. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Heath

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Product!

I would recommend for my family and friends and will probably purchase more as gifts for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: amazing

customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product although smell is not there

Amazing and will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

The oil is lightweight and odorless. I had a chapped spot on my upper lip and nose that I couldn’t heal. This was very soothing to my skin and absorbed quickly without leaving a greasy residue. The oil came with clear instructions, but was clear how to use intuitively. The box offered some additional uses which I hadn’t considered and will try. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren (Mom)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!

Not only was it a great moisturizer but it had such an enticing scent!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great amount, great price

customer_reviews.author: TyAnn

I would buy this again if looking for an oil.
customer_reviews.author: BBDTS

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼

customer_reviews.title: No Scent
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Feels great on the skin and I have no complaints so far. For anyone hoping/wondering, this does NOT come in a glass bottle. Not a deal breaker. It also has no scent whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.author: KL08

customer_reviews.title: A good product

customer_reviews.author: Saeed Ahmed Al-Maliki

customer_reviews.title: Almond oil

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil as a total body moisturizer after swimming. It restores the moisture the pool chemicals take out. I also put it on my brittle fingernails to strengthen them.
